newsitem.title: INDIA: Indian sugar prices ease on little interest.
newsitem.headline: Indian sugar prices ease on little interest.

text.p: Indian sugar prices on Wednesday eased on sluggish consumer demand and litte retail interest, dealers said.
In ready delivery sugar S-30 slid by 5/10 rupees at 1,410/1,440 rupees per quintal while sugar M-30 eased by the same margin at 1,450/1,490 rupees per quintal.

"Sugar mill delivery on the other hand nominally quoted steady at 1,360/1,370 rupees per quintal but trading for mill delivery remained slow as most of the millers have already sold out their quantity of free sale quota for the current month," one broker said.
Overall market sentiments was subdued at the close of the session.
